analyzed: sbyor bas ni/_/phyag rgya chen por bdag sbyor cig_/thabs dang shes rab
translated: so please unite me in the great seal.🔽With the wisdom dagger of nondual method and prajñā,

original: gnyis med pa'i/_/ye shes gzer gyis lung rtog sbyangs/_/gser zhun lta bu'i
analyzed: gnyis med pa'i/_/ye shes gzer gyis lung rtog sbyangs/_/gser zhun lta bu'i
translated: purify the scriptures and realizations.🔽In the purified mind, which is like molten gold,

original: sems dag la/_/gsum gyi byin brlabs 'od kyi 'bru/_/thugs kar thim nas
analyzed: sems dag la/_/gsum gyi byin brlabs 'od kyi 'bru/_/thugs kar thim nas
translated: the light rays of the three blessings dissolve into the heart.🔽The essence of the body, which arises from the vajra path,

original: sku'i dbyig_/rdo rje lam 'byung yul gyi mkha'/_/chos sku byang chub sems kyi
analyzed: sku'i dbyig_/rdo rje lam 'byung yul gyi mkha'/_/chos sku byang chub sems kyi
translated: is the space of the object, the bodhicitta of the dharmakāya.

original: gnas/_/lha rnams so so'i snying po'i sgra/_/hum ha he phat ces byung nas/_/🔽byang chub sems su gcig par thim/_/de nas snying po dran tsham gyis/_/gsung
analyzed: gnas/_/lha rnams so so'i snying po'i sgra/_/hum ha he phat ces byung nas/_/ byang chub sems su gcig par thim/_/de nas snying po dran tsham gyis/_/gsung
translated: The sounds of the essence mantras of the individual deities—hum, ha, he, and phat—arise.🔽They dissolve into one in bodhicitta.🔽Then, through the recollection of the essence mantras, the two mudras of speech are complete.

original: gi phyag rgya gnyis rdzogs nas/_/'od zer 'phro 'du'i sbyor ba yis/_/thugs
analyzed: gi phyag rgya gnyis rdzogs nas/_/'od zer 'phro 'du'i sbyor ba yis/_/thugs
translated: Through the process of the light rays radiating and returning, the mudra of mind blazes.

analyzed: kyi phyag rgya rab tu 'bar/_/de las 'phra mo'i sku spro bsdu/_/phyag rgya chen po'i sku
translated: From that, the subtle form emanates and returns, and the two forms of the mahāmudrā🔽are complete.

analyzed: gnyis rdzogs/_/om ma ha shu n+ya ta dz+nya na badzra swa b+ha ba ad ma ko ham/_om ma ha a

analyzed: b+ha ba ad ma ko ham/_rdo rje pad+mar byin rlabs pa/_/hum las rdo rje rtshe lnga pa/_/

analyzed: la'i gad rgyangs che/_/dbyugs pa'i thur rlung g.yeng ba che ho/_/hum/

original: rgyal po sprin chen po/_/khros pa'i rgyal po char chen 'bebs/_/dkyil 'khor
analyzed: rgyal po sprin chen po/_/khros pa'i rgyal po char chen 'bebs/_/dkyil 'khor
translated: the wrathful king who rains down great rain,🔽the treasure that produces the maṇḍala as desired,

original: yid bzhin 'byung ba'i gter/_/sna tshhogs khros pa'i thig le che ho/_/hum bdud
analyzed: yid bzhin 'byung ba'i gter/_/sna tshhogs khros pa'i thig le che ho/_/hum bdud
translated: the great bindu of various wrathful ones,🔽the great demon of all demons,

original: kun gyi ni bdud chen po/_/bdud kyi bdud de bdud rnams 'joms/_/
analyzed: kun gyi ni bdud chen po/_/bdud kyi bdud de bdud rnams 'joms/_/
translated: the demon of demons, the conqueror of demons,

original: 'jigs pa'i tshhogs kyang 'jigs par byed/_/'jigs byed chen po thig le
analyzed: 'jigs pa'i tshhogs kyang 'jigs par byed/_/'jigs byed chen po thig le

original: che ho/_/hum rdo rje brag chen sra ba'o/_/rdo rje chu bo bdud chen po/_/rdo rje me ste
analyzed: che ho/_/hum rdo rje brag chen sra ba'o/_/rdo rje chu bo bdud chen po/_/rdo rje me ste
translated: Hum is the great vajra rock, the great vajra river, the great demon, the great vajra fire,🔽the great blazing, the great vajra wind, the great whirlwind.

original: kun 'bar che/_/rdo rje rlung chen thor rlung che ho/_/yan lag ma nyams yo byad
analyzed: kun 'bar che/_/rdo rje rlung chen thor rlung che ho/_/yan lag ma nyams yo byad
translated: The great blazing, the great vajra wind, the great scattered wind, ho!🔽🔽The limbs are not impaired, the articles are complete,🔽

original: de kho na nyid snang ba dam pa brgyan
analyzed: de kho na nyid snang ba dam pa brgyan
translated: The ornament of the sublime appearance of reality,🔽the one who knows the complete ritual,

original: /_cho ga rdzogs par shes pa yi/_/rnal 'byor tshhogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ldan/
analyzed: /_cho ga rdzogs par shes pa yi/_/rnal 'byor tshhogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ldan/
translated: the one who possesses the maṇḍala of the assembly of yogins,🔽will definitely accomplish the purpose of well-being.

original: gyi/_/nges par legs pa'i dgos pa 'grub/_/khro bo khro mo'i tshhogs chen po/_/
analyzed: gyi/_/nges par legs pa'i dgos pa 'grub/_/khro bo khro mo'i tshhogs chen po/_/

analyzed: pho nya phyag nyan bka' nyan tshhogs/_/ci bgyi las sogs tshhogs rnams kyis/_/
translated: and the assembly of “what should be done” and so on🔽will perfect the activities and siddhis.

original: dngos grub las rnams rdzogs par byed/_/de nas dkyil 'khor thams cad kun//
analyzed: dngos grub las rnams rdzogs par byed/_/de nas dkyil 'khor thams cad kun//

original: rang gi snying gar bsdu ba ni/_/hum hum zhes ni rab brjod nas/_/'dus pa de

analyzed: nyid ci bder spyod/_/de ltar dkyil 'khor bsdus nas kyang /_rnal 'byor

analyzed: bdag nyid chen po yis/_/spyod lam kun tu ma nyams shing /_/lha nyid du ni

analyzed: rtag tu bsgom/_/phung po lnga nyid khro rgyal gtsho/_/chen po lnga nyid dbang phyug
